Posted By: http404error (4/28/2011 4:05:13 PM)

posts.post_content:
All of the splicers are pretty great for repopulating the board after a wipe in Multiplayer, when paired with everyone's favorite [Doubling Season](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doubling Season).  
  
Also, that's not hair. That's her skull and brain, expanded after she was compleated.

Posted By: Arachibutyrophobia (7/9/2011 7:24:05 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Unlike the Master Splicer's golem, Gaga's golem here will stop a hawk no matter what sword it's carrying. And if you dropped a Blade Splicer the turn before, it'll even come away without a scratch. I'd use her over Master Splicer, myself.

Unlike the Master Splicer's golem, Gaga's golem here will stop a hawk no matter what sword it's carrying. And if you dropped a Blade Splicer the turn before, it'll even come away without a scratch. I'd use her over Master Splicer, myself.

Posted By: EverJohnny (5/22/2011 10:30:37 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Same slot on your run as [Master Splicer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Master Splicer) and [Vital Splicer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vital Splicer). Can easily fill the void between your [Blade Splicer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blade Splicer) and your [Sensor Splicer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sensor Splicer), or let you wait for the mana for your [Maul Splicer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Maul Splicer).
posts.html:
Same slot on your run as Master Splicer and Vital Splicer. Can easily fill the void between your Blade Splicer and your Sensor Splicer, or let you wait for the mana for your Maul Splicer.

Posted By: DeathDark (5/10/2011 9:05:12 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I like this card, because I can see it as a good way to end games. Like.. oh, hey, now all my golems fly and I hit you for 9 to end the game.
  
   
Goes really nicely with phyrexian metamorph and tempered steel because you can copy one of the splicers, which is now also an artifact, and in turn gets +2/2 and creates another golem.
posts.html:
